text: FWIW, <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/2043/> seems good to go as well, so we'd appreciate a look into it.
<@U0XQ35CDD> added one comment <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/2043> (not needed as a comment in the code but would good to have a gerrit comment response)
a couple of +2 will also help here: <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/2567/>

I have a chain of commits [2571] --> [2555] --> [2557] .  They are all pretty trivial :slightly_smiling_face:
The middle one fixes a bug that the last one needs, and the first one is a test relaxation that ensures (I hope) that the middle one passes tests
